statements: SELECT * FROM player_profiles;
SELECT id, username FROM player_profiles WHERE id = 1;
SELECT username, avatar_url FROM player_profiles WHERE username LIKE 'John%';
SELECT * FROM player_profiles ORDER BY id DESC;
SELECT username FROM player_profiles WHERE avatar_url IS NOT NULL;
SELECT * FROM player_profiles WHERE id = 1;
SELECT username, avatar_url FROM player_profiles WHERE id IN (1, 2, 3) ORDER BY id DESC;
SELECT id, username FROM player_profiles WHERE avatar_url IS NOT NULL AND username LIKE 'J%' LIMIT 5;
SELECT * FROM player_profiles WHERE username = 'Alice' ORDER BY id ASC;
SELECT id, username, avatar_url FROM player_profiles WHERE id BETWEEN 2 AND 5 ORDER BY username ASC;
SELECT * FROM player_profiles WHERE id = 1;
SELECT username, avatar FROM player_profiles WHERE username = 'john_doe';
SELECT id, level, score FROM player_stats WHERE player_id = 2;
SELECT * FROM player_stats WHERE score > 1000;
SELECT id, username, level FROM player_profiles WHERE username LIKE 'a%';
SELECT * FROM player_profiles WHERE id = 1;
SELECT username, avatar FROM player_profiles WHERE id > 5 ORDER BY username ASC;

SELECT player_profiles.username, player_stats.level, player_stats.score FROM player_profiles JOIN player_stats ON player_profiles.id = player_stats.player_id WHERE player_stats.score > 100 ORDER BY player_stats.level DESC;
SELECT DISTINCT username FROM player_profiles WHERE avatar IS NOT NULL;
SELECT COUNT(*) AS total_players, AVG(level) AS average_level FROM player_stats;
SELECT * FROM player_profiles;
SELECT id, username FROM player_profiles WHERE id = 1;
SELECT username, avatar_url FROM player_profiles ORDER BY username DESC;
SELECT player_id, games_played, high_score FROM player_stats WHERE games_played > 100 ORDER BY high_score DESC LIMIT 10;
SELECT player_id, log_timestamp, log_message FROM player_logs WHERE log_timestamp > '2021-01-01' ORDER BY log_timestamp ASC;
SELECT id, username, avatar_url FROM player_profiles WHERE username = 'john_doe';
SELECT id, games_played, high_score FROM player_stats WHERE high_score > 1000 ORDER BY high_score DESC;
SELECT player_id, log_timestamp, log_message FROM player_logs WHERE player_id = 5 ORDER BY log_timestamp ASC;
SELECT player_id, games_played, high_score FROM player_stats WHERE games_played BETWEEN 50 AND 100 ORDER BY high_score DESC;
SELECT id, log_timestamp, log_message FROM player_logs WHERE log_timestamp > '2022-01-01' ORDER BY log_timestamp DESC;
SELECT * FROM player_profiles;
SELECT username, avatar_url FROM player_profiles WHERE id = 1;
SELECT username, level, score FROM player_profiles JOIN player_stats ON player_profiles.id = player_stats.player_id;
SELECT player_profiles.username, player_inventory.item_id, player_inventory.quantity FROM player_profiles JOIN player_inventory ON player_profiles.id = player_inventory.player_id;

SELECT player_profiles.username AS player, friend_profiles.username AS friend FROM player_profiles JOIN player_friends ON player_profiles.id = player_friends.player_id JOIN player_profiles AS friend_profiles ON player_friends.friend_id = friend_profiles.id;
SELECT * FROM player_profiles;
SELECT id, username FROM player_profiles ORDER BY username DESC;
SELECT * FROM player_stats WHERE score > 100 ORDER BY level DESC;
SELECT player_id, COUNT(item_id) AS total_items FROM player_inventory GROUP BY player_id HAVING total_items > 5;
SELECT pp.username, pf.friend_id FROM player_profiles pp JOIN player_friends pf ON pp.id = pf.player_id ORDER BY pp.username ASC;
SELECT * FROM players;
SELECT player_id, username FROM players ORDER BY player_id DESC;
SELECT player_id, avatar_url FROM players WHERE player_id = 1;
SELECT * FROM scores ORDER BY score DESC;
SELECT player_id, item_name, quantity FROM items WHERE player_id = 2;
SELECT * FROM players WHERE player_id = 1;
SELECT username, avatar_url FROM players WHERE player_id = 2;
SELECT player_id, SUM(score) AS total_score FROM scores GROUP BY player_id;
SELECT COUNT(achievement_id) AS total_achievements, player_id FROM achievements GROUP BY player_id HAVING total_achievements > 5;
SELECT item_id, item_name, quantity FROM items WHERE player_id = 3 ORDER BY quantity DESC;
